content.query:
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[People]
(
    p_id int NOT NULL, 
    p_name varchar(100), 
    p_surname varchar(100)
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH (p_id),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO


select * from [dbo].[People]

insert into dbo.People (p_id, p_name, p_surname) values(1,'Joe', 'Doe') 
insert into dbo.People values(2,'Peter', 'Pan') GO 
insert into dbo.People values(3,'Johny', 'Cash') GO

describe [dbo].[People]
